user_query: I'm organizing a virtual conference and I want to send reminders to the participants. Check the availability of the SMSAPI.com tool and provide me with the list of subusers. Also, get the current time from the PubNub Network for accurate scheduling.

TaskList.description: Check the availability of the SMSAPI.com tool to ensure it can send SMS reminders.
Retrieve the list of subusers associated with the SMSAPI.com account.
Get the current time from the PubNub Network to schedule the reminders accurately.
Prepare SMS reminder messages for the participants using the information from the previous steps.
Send SMS reminders to the participants using the SMSAPI.com tool.
